title: Last Week's Top Stories - Obama's Trump Diss, Face Mask Innovations & Teachers Get Creative
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - Obama's Trump Diss, Face Mask Innovations & Teachers Get Creative
description:
Barack Obama disses President Trump during his 2020 commencement address, face masks get bizarre upgrades, and teachers step up their game during the pandemic crisis.
